objectives: Students will discuss hobbies and free time using Slang/Street register language
Students will engage with Horror themed scenarios related to hobbies and free time
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of slang level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining hobbies and free time content with Horror narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore hobbies and free time through a Horror lens using Slang/Street language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a frightening or supernatural situation involving hobbies and free time

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice slang register vocabulary related to hobbies and free time in a horror context
Students engage in horror themed role-play about hobbies and free time using slang register
Students create original horror themed content about hobbies and free time in slang register

discussion_questions: How would you describe hobbies and free time in a Horror scenario?
What terror or darkness might be involved in hobbies and free time?
Can you create a Horror story about hobbies and free time?
How does hobbies and free time change when viewed through a Horror perspective?
What slang register expressions would you use to discuss this horror scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Horror situation involving hobbies and free time
roles: Character A: Using slang register in horror context
Character B: Responding in slang register within horror theme

topic_genre_blend: hobbies and free time with terror
hobbies and free time with darkness
hobbies and free time with mysterious

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Slang/Street throughout: Casual street language, colloquialisms, youth speak
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Horror theme: Fear, suspense, supernatural elements

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Slang/Street register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Horror themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of slang register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
